headline: Options Traders Are Boosting Bearish Dollar Views to Record

headline: Nonpartisan CBO says Trump's GOP tax bill will add nearly $4 trillion to U.S. debt
summary: The Republican-backed tax and spending bill would add trillions of dollars to the federal deficit and negatively affect the poorest of Americans, experts say.Tax policy proposed by U.S. President...

headline: Dip Buyers Support Stocks as Bond Market Assesses US Downgrade
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Stock traders knew it was an ugly setup entering Monday, with futures lower in premarket action and Treasury yields racing higher after Moody’s downgraded the US debt at the very end of last week.Most Read from BloombergAmerica, ‘Nation of Porches’NJ Transit Train Engineers Strike, Disrupting Travel to NYCNJ Transit Makes Deal With Engineers, Ending Three-Day StrikeBut then a weird thing happened as trading got underway: The bond market calmed down.
